nodes.title: Chess Bot
nodes.description: Chess Bot is a deep learning model which can replace a human in a chess game and can play chess moves like a human does. The Chess Bot as DL model takes the position of the board as an input and provides a move as the output. This chess bot is targeted at 1500 Elo rating and it is trained on games b/w players of similar strength. For training, We've used 10000 games which gave around 600000 positions for training and 60000 positions for testing. The model is able to achieve around 50% train accuracy and 40% validation accuracy.

nodes.title: Face Mask Detector
nodes.description: Detects that a person is wearing mask or not.
